SECTION_CONTENT:
Reactivity : May intensify fire; oxidizer.
Chemical stability : Oxidizer. Contact with other material may cause fire.
Possibility of hazardous
reactions : Gives off hydrogen by reaction with metals.
Hazardous polymerisation does not occur.
Reactions with organic substances.
Corrosive in contact with metals
Conditions to avoid : Keep away from heat.
Keep away from combustible material.
